channel.title: Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the TimeTurner Podcast! Together, we’ll dive into how social issues have shaped our times, and discover the history behind them. We’ll talk to trailblazers who are leading initiatives to solve these challenges and ask ourselves the question of how we can create a more perfect union.
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the TimeTurner Podcast! Together, we’ll dive into how social issues have shaped our times, and discover the history behind them. We’ll talk to trailblazers who are leading initiatives to solve these challenges and ask ourselves the question of how we can create a more perfect union.
channel.itunes:author: Akshaya Ajith
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast Episodes of the TimeTurner initiative
channel.itunes:keywords: timeturner, history, equality, social change, constitution, law, justice, perfect union
